Date: Thursday, 5/15/1988
Subject: Progress of Jessie Kremer
Dear Sir,
Jessie Kremer has an AVG of .279 at AA Scituate Somersets!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/22/1988
Subject: Status of Scott Carr
Dear Sir,
Scott Carr has an AVG of .235 at AA Scituate Somersets!
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/26/1988
Subject: Progress of Michael Garrett
Dear Sir,
Michael Garrett has nothing more to prove at A Bolton Wilberts!
He has an ERA of 3.55 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director
